name: Racing - Drifting Speed Car 3D
description:
Racing - Drifting Speed Car 3D!!!
Driving your car in differ race, such as amateur challenge, urban rivals club league, professional championship, classic masters and so on. All these could excise skill of drifting, keep the best performance with loved car.
Features:
.Real car drift in traffic
.Fast car racing for speed
.Real city scene, asphalt road
.Luxury cars to choose
.Modified the car you like
.Two car control, gravity or button
.Collect nitro to speed up
